version_name: 1.12.0: - A brand new design for the profile page.                                                                                                                                                                                Released May 25

version_description:
- - تصميم جديد لصفحة بالصدفة - -
في أحدث إصدار لدينا جعلنا من السهل عليك التواصل مع شريك حياتك المقبل، من خلال تحسين صفحة التعارف بالصدفة. الآن ليس لديك أي عذر لعدم المبادرة بالكتابة وإرسال تحية!

- - New design for match view - -
In our newest update we have made it easier for you to communicate with your next potential partner, by improving on the match view. So now there is no excuse not to write and say hi!

- - تصميم جديد لصفحة بالصدفة - -
في أحدث إصدار لدينا جعلنا من السهل عليك التواصل مع شريك حياتك المقبل، من خلال تحسين صفحة التعارف بالصدفة. الآن ليس لديك أي عذر لعدم المبادرة بالكتابة وإرسال تحية!

- - New design for match view - -
In our newest update we have made it easier for you to communicate with your next potential partner, by improving on the match view. So now there is no excuse not to write and say hi!

In our newest update we have made it easier for you to communicate with your next potential partner, by improving on the match view. So now there is no excuse not to write and say hi!

.نعمل دائما على تحسين صدفة من خلال تحديثات منتظمة تضم تغييرات تصميم طفيفة وإصلاح بعض الأخطاء. وكلما قمنا بتغييرات أكبر سنعلمكم بها من خلال نشرها هنا وكذلك داخل التطبيق

We’re always improving Soudfa through regular updates bringing minor design changes and bug fixes. As major changes become available, we’ll share them with you here as well as on the app.

بالنسبة لمستخدمي  نظام iOS 9 ، يرجى التحديث إلى iOS 10 أو أعلى من أجل الاستمرار في الحصول على تحديثات صدفة وكل التطويرات المستقبلية.

iOS 9 users, please update to iOS 10 or higher in order to continue getting updates for new and improved functionality.

This version contains the following new features:
- Locally formatted numbers throughout the application

This version contains the following bug fixes:
- Fixed prefilled form in search filter

.باسم الهوا والشمس والبلاجات.. باسم الشباب والحب والأجازات.. الصيف أحلى مع صدفة لذلك قمنا بتطوير ثلاث فترات مختلفة في صدفة بلس: شهر أو ٣ أشهر أو ٦ أشهر. اختر ما يناسبك واستمتع بتجربة كاملة على صدفة

.نعمل دائما على تحسين صدفة لتوفير تجربة امنة وممتعة لك من خلال تحديثات منتظمة تتضمن تغييرات طفيفة بالتصميم وإصلاح الخلل إذا وجد. في حال قمنا بتغييرات كبيرة سنشاركك بها هنا أو عبر التطبيق

Summer romance in the sun! Is there anything better? We’ve developed three different Soudfa Plus periods you can choose between. We’ve also broken the record for ice-cream consumed in the month of July. Hmm come to think about it, maybe the Soudfa thing is more important to highlight… Anyway, choose between: 1 month, 3 months or 6 months and make sure you meet your romance.

We’ve got the coolest team working to improve your experience on Soudfa with minor design changes and bug fixes. If we change anything major, we’ll share them with you here and in the app.

.يحتوي هذا الإصدار على إصلاحات ثانوية وتحسينات لتجربة أفضل. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستحصل على اقتراحات المناطق والمكان بشكل أسرع عند إدخال تفاصيل موقعك الجغرافي

.نعمل دائما على تحسين صدفة لتوفير تجربة امنة وممتعة لك من خلال تحديثات منتظمة تتضمن تغييرات طفيفة بالتصميم وإصلاح الخلل إذا وجد. في حال قمنا بتغييرات كبيرة سنشاركك بها هنا أو عبر التطبيق

We’ve also broken the record for ice-cream consumed in the month of July. Hmm come to think about it, maybe the Soudfa thing is more important to highlight… Anyway, choose between: 1 month, 3 months or 6 months and make sure you meet your romance.

This version contains minor bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, you receive area suggestions faster when inputting your location specific details.

We’ve got the coolest team working to improve your experience on Soudfa with minor design changes and bug fixes. If we change anything major, we’ll share them with you here and in the app.

.نعمل حاليا على اعادة تصميم صدفة لتقديم أفضل الميزات وأروع التصاميم وأكثرها فعالية لك. أول تحديث قمنا به هو تصميم صفحة الملف الشخصي لتطل بشكل حديث ومميز

.قمنا ايضا بإضافة طريقة أسهل للإبلاغ عن أي سلوك غير لائق او مخالف لضمان تجربة امنة على صدفة واخيرا وليس أخرا قمنا ببعض التغييرات في اللائحة

.ابقى معنا لتترقب كل جديدنا

We’re redesigning Soudfa to bring you the best features and coolest designs possible. The first update is a redesign of the profile page. Its new modern look will make you look even more attractive ;)

We’ve also developed an easier way to report inappropriate behaviour - to ensure the safest experience online - and moved a bit around the menu.

This is just the beginning so stay tuned.

We’ve got the coolest team working to improve your experience on Soudfa with minor design changes and bug fixes. If we change anything major, we’ll share them with you here and in the app.

.لاتزال التحديثات جارية على صدفة فبعد إعادة تصميم صفحة الملف الشخصي، نقدم الآن طلة جديدة بتصميم كامل لصفحة الرسائل والتواصل. يشمل التحديث ميزات وتصاميم جديدة ورائعة تتضمن طلبات الدردشة وتعديل الرسائل وطرق أسهل للتواصل مع تعارفك
.نتمنى لك تصفح ممتع

The updates are still coming your way, now with a complete and awesome redesign of Flirts and Messages. Besides the modern design, we’ve developed several new user-friendly features, such as Chat Requests, Edit, and easier ways to get in touch with your matches. We hope that you enjoy the new Soudfa! Happy Swipin’!

ياي! لدينا بعض الأخبار الرائعة لك! لقد قمنا بإعادة تصميم شامل على جميع صفحات صدفة من خلال إضافة نص مساعدة أسفل حقول الإدخال لجعله أكثر وضوحًا وسهولة، لأننا نرغب في منح مشتركينا أفضل تجربة.

للحفاظ على تحديثك بأحدث وأروع الميزات، يرجى ملاحظة أن الإصدارات المستقبلية متوفرة فقط مع نظام التشغيل iOS 11 وما فوق.

Yay! We have some great news for you! We’ve made an extensive redesign on all pages by adding a help text under input fields to make it more clear and easy, because we’d like to help our users to improve their experience.

In order to keep you updated with the latest & coolest features, please note that the future versions are only available with iOS 11 and above.

أخبار سارة! قد أجرينا تحديث للألوان يحسن تجربتك المرئية في صدفة بطلة جديدة، علاوة على ذلك، ستستمتع أيضًا بتصميم جديد ومشرق. مرحبا بكم ونراكم في صدفه

Oh happy day! New updates have arrived and this means you get to enjoy our brand new guide to our Explore feature, the redesign of our search filter and then we made Explore visible in the tab bar. Have fun!

New year, new update. We’re kicking 2020 off with a new update. Yippee! We’ve improved our match function, which means you’ll get a smoother experience when you’re matching with new singles on Soudfa. So go ahead and update the app!

New year, new update. We’re kicking 2020 off with a new update. Yippee! We’ve improved our match function, which means you’ll get a smoother experience when you’re matching with new singles on Soudfa. So go ahead and update the app!

What’s New?
- “Discover” has been improved and now displays if another user has sent you a like or message
- When tapping between a users images on “Discover” you get additional information about the user
- You can now send messages from “Discover”. Use this to your advantage and stand out from the rest
- We appreciate your feedback, so we have created an internal feedback system - let us know what you think!
This release also contains general bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s New?
- “Discover” has been improved and now displays if another user has sent you a like or message
- When tapping between a users images on “Discover” you get additional information about the user
- You can now send messages from “Discover”. Use this to your advantage and stand out from the rest
- We appreciate your feedback, so we have created an internal feedback system - let us know what you think!
This release also contains general bug fixes and performance improvements.

Holy moly, Soudfa is full of new stuff. Our superhero developers, have polished the search feature and made the experience even more delish, when you’re using the filters to narrow down the search, for the perfect match. Now, you’re able to choose the distance you want to search within, with a slide bar. We’ve cleaned up the order of basic criteria and made it easy to clear the criteria again. But the party doesn't end here. You see, we’ve also improved image quality on Explore. Ready, set, go!

Could the day get any better? Let’s try: We just released, not one, not two, but several sparkling new updates on Soudfa. We made a new profile action overlay. Then we made sure that, your message request now shows the latest message you received or sent. And then we improved the way you start your chat, by removing the message headline and  thereby made communicating with other singles easier, just like that. Let the chat games begin!

We love colours! That’s why we’ve added even more on Soudfa. When you create sparks with other singles, the relation is now shown with new glowing and streamlined colours and new profile relation overlays. Not only that, you’re now able to enjoy multiple messages in Profile, Explore and Chat. Check them out by updating the app right now. Go paint the town!

Spring is upon us any minute now, so we’ve started on the spring cleaning at Soudfa. We’ve gotten out in the corners and dusted the app off with bug fixes and small optimisations. So, now it all shines and it smells of fresh soap water. In other words, it means you can enjoy an improvement in the way you navigate on Soudfa and can now explore our dating universe, without the minor bugs hiding in the corners.

Ramadan Mubarak! We have polished Soudfa and adjusted a few things things here and there. But we can also introduce you to a brand new feature, tadaaa! We’ve made it all a bit more fun so now you can see which members you share interests with as soon as you open Explore and scroll away. Want to share your good ideas? Contact us at info@soudfa.com and get the chance to get your input on the next release. We look forward to hearing from you!

They say communication is the key to success! So, we just made a brand new update on Chats, which means you now get to enjoy a beautifully organised overview of your chats, matches and likes. Then we cleaned up the menu bar and added the Search feature to it. Pretty awesome right? Update to the newest version of Soudfa and discover it now! Enjoy!

Your adventure on Soudfa must be lovely from start to finish! So we’ve turned up the deliciousness and updated our intro with brand new and beautiful illustrations. But it doesn’t stop here. We’ve also optimised the user experience in our chat requests and made it clear who’s hungry for your attention.
Want to share your good ideas? Contact us at info@soudfa.com(opens in new tab) and get the chance to get your input on the next release. We look forward to hearing from you!

The people have spoken! We love receiving all your feedback. That’s why we’ve made brand-new improvements and made it easier to re-send confirmation emails. Enjoy the hunt for your spring love!

A lot has happened in a very short time! We’ve been running on full speed and done a lot of new upgrades on Soudfa. Now it’s easier for you to set your notifications so you can decide when and how you want to hear from us when Soudfa is buzzing. In addition, we’ve made it a little more smooth and easy when you want to confirm your email and/or password for your account. Finally, we pulled out the big painting brushed and made new pretty illustrations. Enjoy!

We’ve made it much easier when you need to jump on to Soudfa, Now, you can smoothly use your Apple ID to log in to your profile. Isn’t it neat? We also just took the usual round with the dust cloth and got minor bugs out of the way. All the deliciousness is ready and you can enjoy the new improvements now. Just update the app, go to Connections to connect your Apple ID and try it now!

Your online safety is alpha and omega. So, we’ve tightened the security and created a new report flow on Soudfa. Then we also installed the age filter on Search, so you’ll automatically meet singles closer to your age unless you change the age group in the search filter. In addition, our developers have been catching minor bugs. All you have to do now is update your app and enjoy the new improvements. Enjoy!

We’re designed to help you find true love. So we’ve developed a new tool to get you to the finish line faster. Say hello to match score! Update Soudfa and explore how much potential you have with all the singles you meet in the future. Enjoy!
